resources.string: Welcome To Wayne County Community College District ITI Career Programs
The Computer Information Systems: Application Developer certificate is designed to prepare students for mobile application development.

The Computer Information Systems: Database Administrator certification is designed to give students a technical foundation to design and implement the infrastructure for business solutions using database tools.

The Computer Information Systems Associate of Applied Science degree program is designed to provide a solid foundation in the fundamental skills that are generally required to analyze system requirements and design solutions, or to support and manage the application of technology resources.

The Computer Information Systems Network Administrator College Certificate is designed to provide a solid foundation in the fundamental skills that are generally required to analyze system requirements and design solutions or, to support and manage the application of technology resources.
